cause.description:
From the Facebook group:
http://heythrop.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2234950606
This group is designed around the proposal that philosophy and critical thinking be moved into a central position in the British education system, from early infancy onwards. There are more details about this proposal, as well as a petition to Downing Street on the petition website:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Philosophy-Edu/
1. Place critical thinking training in British schools from an early age.
2. Promote the development of fundamental reasoning ability.
3. Promote interest in philosophical and scientific enquiry.
cause.mission: Make Philosophy/Critical Thinking central to the British educational system
cause.name: Philosophy / Critical thinking in British schools.
